General.Name: Saehwa IMC Co Ltd
General.Description: Dynamic Design Co., LTD. primarily engages in the manufacture and sale of tire molds and tire production equipment in Korea. The company offers casting and engraving molds, and containers; and tire manufacturing equipment, such as tire building machines, drums, and curing presses. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Gwangju-si, South Korea.
